Class InternshipFilter

java.lang.Object
utils.filter.InternshipFilter
public class InternshipFilter extends Object
Reusable component for filtering and sorting internships. Implements Strategy pattern for different filter criteria. Default sorting is alphabetical by company name.

  • Constructor Details

    • InternshipFilter

      private InternshipFilter()
      Private constructor to prevent instantiation. This is a utility class with only static methods.

  • Method Details

    • applyFilters

      public static List<?> applyFilters(List<?> internships, FilterSettings settings)
      Filter and sort internships based on filter settings. Uses List<?> for MVC compliance (no model imports)
      Parameters:
      internships - List of internships to filter
      settings - Filter settings to apply
      Returns:
      Filtered and sorted list

    • applyStatusFilter

      private static Stream<Internship> applyStatusFilter(Stream<Internship> stream, InternshipStatus status)
      Filters internships by status enum. Special handling for "VACANT" - shows APPROVED internships with available slots.
      Parameters:
      stream - The stream of internships to filter
      status - The InternshipStatus to filter by (null for no filter)
      Returns:
      Filtered stream

    • applyStatusFilterByString

      private static Stream<Internship> applyStatusFilterByString(Stream<Internship> stream, String statusStr)
      Filters internships by status string. Supports "Available" and "Filled" as user-facing filters. Falls back to enum matching for backward compatibility.
      Parameters:
      stream - The stream of internships to filter
      statusStr - The status string ("AVAILABLE", "FILLED", or enum name)
      Returns:
      Filtered stream

    • applyMajorFilter

      private static Stream<Internship> applyMajorFilter(Stream<Internship> stream, String major)
      Filters internships by preferred major. Case-insensitive matching.
      Parameters:
      stream - The stream of internships to filter
      major - The major to filter by (null or empty for no filter)
      Returns:
      Filtered stream

    • applyLevelFilter

      private static Stream<Internship> applyLevelFilter(Stream<Internship> stream, String level)
      Filters internships by difficulty level. Case-insensitive matching.
      Parameters:
      stream - The stream of internships to filter
      level - The level to filter by (null or empty for no filter)
      Returns:
      Filtered stream

    • applyOpeningDateFilter

      private static Stream<Internship> applyOpeningDateFilter(Stream<Internship> stream, LocalDate minDate)
      Filters internships by opening date (on or after specified date).
      Parameters:
      stream - The stream of internships to filter
      minDate - The minimum opening date (null for no filter)
      Returns:
      Filtered stream

    • applyClosingDateFilter

      private static Stream<Internship> applyClosingDateFilter(Stream<Internship> stream, LocalDate maxDate)
      Filters internships by closing date (on or before specified date).
      Parameters:
      stream - The stream of internships to filter
      maxDate - The maximum closing date (null for no filter)
      Returns:
      Filtered stream

    • applyCompanyFilter

      private static Stream<Internship> applyCompanyFilter(Stream<Internship> stream, String company)
      Filters internships by company name (exact match). Case-insensitive matching.
      Parameters:
      stream - The stream of internships to filter
      company - The company name to filter by (null or empty for no filter)
      Returns:
      Filtered stream

    • applyKeywordFilter

      private static Stream<Internship> applyKeywordFilter(Stream<Internship> stream, String keyword)
      Filters internships by keyword search. Searches in title, description, and company name. Case-insensitive matching.
      Parameters:
      stream - The stream of internships to filter
      keyword - The keyword to search for (null or empty for no filter)
      Returns:
      Filtered stream

    • applySorting

      private static List<Internship> applySorting(List<Internship> internships, String sortOrder)
      Applies sorting to internship list based on sort order. Default is alphabetical by company name, then title.
      Parameters:
      internships - The list of internships to sort
      sortOrder - The sort order ("ID", "CLOSING_DATE", "OPENING_DATE", "COMPANY", "LEVEL", "ALPHABETICAL")
      Returns:
      Sorted list of internships

    • getStatusOptions

      public static String[] getStatusOptions()
      Get available filter options for status. Shows "Available" and "Filled" for students/company reps. Shows PENDING, APPROVED, REJECTED for staff approve/reject workflow.
      Returns:
      array of status filter options

    • getLevelOptions

      public static String[] getLevelOptions()
      Get available filter options for level.
      Returns:
      array of level filter options

    • getAvailableMajors

      public static List<String> getAvailableMajors(List<?> internships)
      Get unique majors from internships list (using reflection for MVC compliance).
      Parameters:
      internships - list of internship objects
      Returns:
      list of unique major names

    • getAvailableCompanies

      public static List<String> getAvailableCompanies(List<?> internships)
      Get unique companies from internships list (using reflection for MVC compliance).
      Parameters:
      internships - list of internship objects
      Returns:
      list of unique company names
